panels.description: Number of objects on the heap. General memory pressure indicator
panels.title: Count of objects in heap

panels.description: Number of goroutines and general load pressure indicator
panels.title: Goroutines

panels.description: Time since last contact to leader. General indicator of Raft latency
panels.title: Raft Last Contact

panels.description: Time elapsed to write log, mark in flight, and start replication
panels.title: Raft Dispatch Log

panels.description: Time elapsed to broadcast gossip messages
panels.title: Memberlist Gossip

panels.description: Number of Raft transactions - general indicator of the write load on the servers.
panels.title: Raft Apply Count

panels.description: Time difference between when a message was first passed into Raft and when the resulting commit took place on the leader
panels.title: Raft Commit Time

panels.description: The time it takes for a Raft transaction to be replicated to a quorum of followers
panels.title: Raft Append Entries

panels.description: Time it takes for a server to apply Raft entries to the internal state machine.
panels.title: Raft FSM apply

panels.description: Number of RPC requests being handled
panels.title: RPC Requests

panels.description: Number of RPC requests being handled that result in an error
panels.title: RPC Errors

panels.description: Time to live for Vault token
panels.title: Server token TTL

panels.description: Time since last successful Vault token renewal
panels.title: Token Last Renew

panels.description: Time until next Vault token renewal attempt
panels.title: Token Next Renew

panels.description: Time elapsed to manipulate Vault tokens
panels.title: Tokens
